pageContext.claim: “With China and President Xi, when he was at Mar-a-Lago six months ago, I said to him, "Would you do me a favor? Would you take our cattle?" In 2000 they would not take our cattle for whatever reason. After a short discussion, he said, 'I will.' The cattle is now going to China.”
pageContext.analysis: China had already agreed to allow the sale of U.S. beef under a deal brokered by the Obama administration. The only thing new was that a definite date was set for when sales would begin.
